lead_paragraph: SCHINDLER--Michael J.,55, of Fair Lawn, NJ passed away on Wednesday, June 1, 2016, after a hard-fought battle with leukemia. Born in Philadelphia, PA, he resided in Brooklyn, NY before moving to Fair Lawn ten years ago. Michael earned a Bachelor of Fine Arts Degree in Theater from Ithaca College in 1982. He loved all sports and especially enjoyed golf, tennis, yoga and tai chi. Known professionally as Michael Sage Schindler, he owned and operated Lightning Shakes New York, a special event planning and services business, for more than 20 years. He brought passion, inspiration, compassion, and boundless energy to his work, and he remained active in the business until his passing. He also shared his enthusiasm for revelry with his community in Radburn, NJ, hosting many family and community events over the years. Beloved husband of Tiffony (Kidd) Schindler. Loving and devoted father to his daughters Kaia (9) and Luca (7) Schindler. Cherished son of Sondra Gavzy and husband Paul, and of David Schindler and wife Mary Ann. Dear brother of Lisa Wagman and Janey Dean, and dear step brother of Leah Jungkind, and Matthew, Aaron, and Joshua Gavzy. He will be deeply missed. A graveside service is planned for Monday, June 6, 2016, 1:00pm at George Washington Memorial Park, 234 Paramus Road, Paramus, NJ. In lieu of flowers, donations in Michael's memory for the growth, development, and continued intellectual and athletic pursuits of his children would be appreciated. Donations may be sent to Tiffony Schindler, c/o Vander Plaat-Caggiano Funeral Home, 13-31 Saddle River Road, Fair Lawn, NJ 07410. For condolences and additional information please visit www.vpfairlawn.com. 1/3
